title: Webcam Troubleshooting
description: Resolving webcam connection and permission issues.

steps.title: Physical Connection
steps.instruction: Check USB connection. Try another USB port.

steps.title: System & App Check
steps.instruction: Restart your system. Close other apps that might be using the camera (Zoom, Teams, etc.).

steps.title: Settings & Permissions
steps.instruction: Check camera permissions in your OS settings and ensure the correct camera is selected in the app.

steps.title: Raise Ticket
steps.instruction: If needed, raise a ticket with: Asset ID, Error screenshot, App name, and steps tried.
